attributes.action: say no to airport expansion at heathrow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Goverment can'nt go ahead with plans to expand heathrow airport when the goverment says it wants to reduce emissions the worst thing to do is to expand emissions from the start does our goverment really care abut climate change

The Conservatives are opposed to the third runway, preferring an improvement to rail links instead which make real sense

More than 50 Labour MPs are opposed to it and Environment Secretary Hilary Benn has voiced reservations about the impact of the development.

But there is now growing media expectations that the Prime Minister is behind the scheme, backed by Business Secretary Lord Mandelson.

Hundreds of environment protesters are to gather at Heathrow's Terminal 1 on Monday to demonstrate against the expansion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
